t: Check out this Amazon review of HECS Human Energy Conceal Suit
s: I live in Arizona, I'm a bow hunter, I've been wearing the Hecs suit every time I go deer hunting. Every time I get a deer close, there is no difference when I'm wearing the suit or not. Save your money and buy good camouflage! What a disappointment, there is so much discussion about this stuff, ...
